latestTechStacks.name: TechStacks Website
latestTechStacks.description: The original TechStacks Website developed with Angular 1.2 on old school .NET Technology Stack before the advent of .NET Core with the back-end developed using ServiceStack running on the classic ASP.NET Framework and hosted on Windows/IIS that's still available from: angular.techstacks.io

latestTechStacks.name: TechStacks
latestTechStacks.description: Find and share information on your favorite technologies with others sharing similar Technological interests.

latestTechStacks.name: Ipdata
latestTechStacks.description: We provide a fast, highly available IP Geolocation API with reliable performance. Get the Geolocation, Organisation, Currency, Timezone, Calling Code, Flag and Tor Exit Node status data from any IPv4 or IPv6 address.

latestTechStacks.name: StackOverflow
latestTechStacks.description: A language-independent collaboratively edited question and answer site for programmers. It features questions and answers on a wide range of topics in computer programming. The website serves as a platform for users to ask and answer questions, and, through membership and active participation, to vote questions and answers up or down and edit questions and answers in a fashion similar to a wiki or Digg.

latestTechStacks.name: Coinbase
latestTechStacks.description: Your bitcoin wallet. Coinbase is the world's most popular bitcoin wallet. We make it easy to securely buy, use, and accept bitcoin currency.

latestTechStacks.name: Gistlyn
latestTechStacks.description: Gistlyn is the ultimate C# Gist IDE for trying out and exploring C# and .NET libraries on NuGet from a zero install - modern browser. It's ideal for use as a companion tool for trying out libraries during development or on the go from the comfort of your iPad by going to gistlyn.com.

latestTechStacks.name: Redis Vue
latestTechStacks.description: A Simple Redis Admin UI developed with Vue and ServiceStack Templates running on .NET Core. It built as a ServiceStack Web App where the entire .NET Core App is developed with built-in live-reloading but without any C# and requires no build or compilation in either the client Vue App or the ServiceStack Web App.

latestTechStacks.name: elmah.io
latestTechStacks.description: The core product in our Stack is Elasticsearch. We host everything on Azure in a combination of Web apps and Virtual Machines.

latestTechStacks.name: SketchDeck
latestTechStacks.description: Good design is more important than ever. SketchDeck combines software and a professional design team to make good design fast and efficient. From marketing assets to presentations, look your best every time.

latestTechStacks.name: LabRecruit.com
latestTechStacks.description:
Talent Acquisition Reimagined
Let your team's profile do the talking. Using machine learning to build a model of your company's talent, it's easy for us to find your next A-player.
Using publicly available data, LabRecruit builds deep insights into your current software engineers work history, professional interests, and skillset. These models are compared against the roles you're looking to fill, and brings you a group of excellent developers that would make a great fit for your team.

latestTechStacks.name: ReactDOM
latestTechStacks.description:
ReactDOM is the primer ReactJS newsletter. ReactDOM helps 1000s of programmers learn how to code more effectively in every programming language. 

The website is primarily based on WordPress. Customizations have been made in regards to speed. The site is always being optimized.

Start learning now at https://reactdom.com

latestTechStacks.name: Instacart
latestTechStacks.description: Instacart delivers groceries from local stores in two hours. Choose from stores like Whole Foods Market, Target, Costco and Petco. Try us today for free.

latestTechStacks.name: GitHub
latestTechStacks.description: GitHub is a development platform inspired by the way you work. From open source to business, you can host and review code, manage projects, and build software alongside millions of other developers.

latestTechStacks.name: Platform.sh
latestTechStacks.description: Continuous deployment cloud hosting for blazing fast performance. No more failed deployments. No more downtime. Improves your web development productivity.

latestTechStacks.name: Sendy - Backend
latestTechStacks.description: Let's Deliver! Sendy connects businesses with Drivers to make delivery simple and transparent. We believe in the power of partnership. Together we will unlock Africa’s potential.

latestTechStacks.name: Taiga
latestTechStacks.description:
Taiga is a Free, Open Source and Simple to use project management platform for agile developers & designers and project managers who want a beautiful tool that makes work truly enjoyable.
You can check all technologies used at https://github.com/taigaio

latestTechStacks.name: Snipcart
latestTechStacks.description: In a nutshell, Snipcart is all about making selling online easier for developers and merchants alike. It’s a third-party application that allows developers to quickly turn any website or web app into an extensive shopping cart platform, fully customizable and responsive. By adding a short JavaScript line to their source code, developers can use simple HTML Markup to turn any element into buy able items.

latestTechStacks.name: DailyStory
latestTechStacks.description: DailyStory equips your team with a single, turn-key, marketing attribution platform that provides the services, tools, and expertise you need to know how you found your best customers.

latestTechStacks.name: Facebook
latestTechStacks.description: Facebook is a social utility that connects people with friends and others who work, study and live around them. Millions of people use Facebook everyday to keep up with friends, upload an unlimited number of photos, share links and videos, and learn more about the people they meet.

latestTechStacks.name: Instagram
latestTechStacks.description:
Instagram is a fast, beautiful and fun way to share your life with friends and family.

Take a picture or video, choose a filter to transform its look and feel, then post to Instagram - it's that easy. You can even share to Facebook, Twitter, Tumblr and more. It's a new way to see the world.

popularTechStacks.name: Airbnb
popularTechStacks.description: Whether an apartment for a night, a castle for a week, or a villa for a month, Airbnb connects people to unique travel experiences, at any price point, in more than 34,000 cities and 190 countries. And with world-class customer service and a growing community of users, Airbnb is the easiest way for people to monetize their extra space and showcase it to an audience of millions.
popularTechStacks.details:
## Airbnb Architecture Links

 - [Airbnb is engineering itself into a data-driven company](https://gigaom.com/2013/07/29/airbnb-is-engineering-itself-into-a-data-driven-company/) _(gigaom.com)_
 - [How Airbnb used Amazon Web Services to conquer the rental market](http://www.citeworld.com/article/2365284/cloud-computing/how-airbnb-used-amazon-web-services-to-conquer-the-rental-market.html) _(citeworld.com)_
 - [AirBnB Technology Stack](http://www.yandss.com/yanfilofyev/2013/08/airbnb-technology-stack/) _(yandss.com)_
 - [What is the technology stack of airbnb?](http://www.quora.com/What-is-the-technology-stack-of-airbnb) _(quora.com)_
 - [Two Tech Stacks, Two Backbone Apps](https://blog.dylants.com/2013/03/09/two-tech-stacks-two-backbone-apps/) _(blog.dylants.com)_
 - [AWS Case Study: Airbnb](http://aws.amazon.com/solutions/case-studies/airbnb/) _(aws.amazon.com)_

popularTechStacks.name: TechStacks Website
popularTechStacks.description: The original TechStacks Website developed with Angular 1.2 on old school .NET Technology Stack before the advent of .NET Core with the back-end developed using ServiceStack running on the classic ASP.NET Framework and hosted on Windows/IIS that's still available from: angular.techstacks.io
popularTechStacks.details:
## Implementation Details

TechStacks is a modern Single Page App built using ServiceStack's new [node.js powered AngularJS VS.NET Template](https://github.com/ServiceStack/ServiceStackVS/blob/master/angular-spa.md) which leverages [Bower](http://bower.io/), [Grunt.js](http://gruntjs.com) and [Gulp.js](http://gulpjs.com) for all [Client App development, optimization](https://github.com/ServiceStack/ServiceStackVS/blob/master/angular-spa.md) and [deployment](https://github.com/ServiceStack/ServiceStack/wiki/Simple-Deployments-to-AWS-with-WebDeploy#deploy-using-grunt) tasks. 

The [AngularJS App](https://angularjs.org/) is based on a [Bootstrap template](http://getbootstrap.com) featuring:

 - HTML5 Routing to enable ideal pretty urls, full page reloads and back button support
 - Same Services supporting both human-readable Slugs or integer primary keys
 - Responsive design supporting iPad Landscape and Portrait modes
 - Preloading and background data fetching to reduce flicker and maximize responsiveness
 - [Disqus](https://disqus.com/) commenting system
 - [Chosen](http://harvesthq.github.io/chosen/) for UX friendly multi combo box

TechStack's back-end is built on the [ServiceStack Web Framework](https://servicestack.net/) utilizing: 

 - [Twitter and GitHub OAuth Providers](https://github.com/ServiceStack/ServiceStack/wiki/Authentication-and-authorization)
 - Substitutable [OrmLite](https://github.com/ServiceStack/ServiceStack.OrmLite) RDBMS [PostgreSQL and Sqlite](https://github.com/ServiceStackApps/TechStacks/blob/875e78910e43d2230f0925b71d5990497216511e/src/TechStacks/TechStacks/AppHost.cs#L49-L56) back-ends
 - [Auto Query](https://github.com/ServiceStack/ServiceStack/wiki/Auto-Query) for automatic services of RDBMS tables
 - [RDBMS Sessions and In Memory Caching](https://github.com/ServiceStack/ServiceStack/wiki/Caching)
 - [Smart Razor Views](http://razor.servicestack.net)
 - [Fluent Validation](https://github.com/ServiceStack/ServiceStack/wiki/Validation)

### [View the Source](https://github.com/ServiceStackApps/TechStacks)

For the finer details on how this website is implemented, check out the [TechStacks GitHub project](https://github.com/ServiceStackApps/TechStacks).
popularTechStacks.detailsHtml:
Implementation Details

TechStacks is a modern Single Page App built using ServiceStack's new node.js powered AngularJS VS.NET Template which leverages Bower, Grunt.js and Gulp.js for all Client App development, optimization and deployment tasks.

The AngularJS App is based on a Bootstrap template featuring:

  • HTML5 Routing to enable ideal pretty urls, full page reloads and back button support
  • Same Services supporting both human-readable Slugs or integer primary keys
  • Responsive design supporting iPad Landscape and Portrait modes
  • Preloading and background data fetching to reduce flicker and maximize responsiveness
  • Disqus commenting system
  • Chosen for UX friendly multi combo box

TechStack's back-end is built on the ServiceStack Web Framework utilizing:

  • Twitter and GitHub OAuth Providers
  • Substitutable OrmLite RDBMS PostgreSQL and Sqlite back-ends
  • Auto Query for automatic services of RDBMS tables
  • RDBMS Sessions and In Memory Caching
  • Smart Razor Views
  • Fluent Validation

View the Source

For the finer details on how this website is implemented, check out the TechStacks GitHub project.

popularTechStacks.name: Uber
popularTechStacks.description: Uber Technologies Inc. is an American multinational online transportation network company headquartered in San Francisco, California. We’re finding better ways for cities to move, work, and thrive. Download the app  and get a ride in minutes. Or become a driver and earn money on your schedule.
popularTechStacks.details:

Instagram is a fast, beautiful and fun way to share your life with friends and family.

Take a picture or video, choose a filter to transform its look and feel, then post to Instagram - it's that easy. You can even share to Facebook, Twitter, Tumblr and more. It's a new way to see the world.

popularTechStacks.name: Trello
popularTechStacks.description: Trello is the free, flexible, and visual way to organize anything with anyone. Infinitely flexible. Incredibly easy to use. Great mobile apps. It's free. Trello keeps track of everything, from the big picture to the minute details. Trello lets you see everything about your project in a single glance.
